input.sentences: the guy had buckets of food
output.sentences: Before they headed out for Spring Break, Joe went out and brought back food for the gang.
As they waited for the rest of the crew to get ready, Barb and Sue played cards.
Missy was excited to see that Eric was going to be joining them for the trip.
When they finally arrived in Florida, they piled out of their cars and laughed with celebratory drinks.
Meg was the first to hit the beach and got a fantastic tan.
